channel.title: [DELTA] Cammy-pvp project [DELTA]
channel.description:
Well, i like the cammy pvp source, but there are lots of combat glitches, so here is my progress from fixing them.
Note: im using a different client then the cammy pvp one
To-Do-List: (Not done)
-fix prayer - 0% -Barrows minigame - 0% -Quests? - 0% -less drop rates - 0% -Fix gameframe - 0% -Player clipping - 0% -Freezable npcs - 0% -thieving - 0% -Antibot for thieving - 0% -Delete commands - 0% -Fighter torso + defenders from cyclops - 0%
Working on: -Clean Client.java (So messy lol) - 5% -fix combat - 30% -Training - 20% -npcs - 1% -Slayer - 85% -Fix mage timers - 35% -economy - 1% -adjust shops - 15% -adjust hits - 45% -No trading + killing with same ip - 75% -Fix item models (glitched because i replaced cache with smaller size one) - 35% -npc clipping - 50%
100% completed:
-No chaotic in pvp -Delete dclaws -Delete pvp gear - 100% -adjust starter kit - 100%
Pictures: Will upload soon
Last updates:
6 Oct: -Fixed server sometimes doesnt let you log in for few mins -Deleted dragon claws More coming soon...
7 Oct: -Deleted chaotic -Deleted pvp gear -worked on npc clipping (Not done) -adjusted shops a bit (including prices) -deleted leveling commands (master and tank) + pure stats on login -added xp rate x100 + the ability to lock your xp -added mystery box + caskets (can be dropped by monsters, mystery box contains items or sometimes a casket, the casket contains 50k to around 1m cash)
8 Oct: -Fixed player was able to hit from far with melee (melee was like range) - fixed completly -Fixed same ip trading + trading and dropping on new accounts (Only killing same ip to go) -Adjusted melee hits a bit (Not done)

item.title: [DELTA] Cammy-pvp project [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

[quote=“pot up pls, post:8, topic:417101”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=519039.msg3772667#msg3772667 date=1317841832]

just reading the name, tells me this server won’t get far lol. anyway gl.

Why not? Not all Cammy PvP’s fail.
[/quote]
90% off them do. the’re not stable for shit.[/quote]

That’s because the creator of cammy pvp only knew how to move objects, create teleports and all that basic crap when the server was made.

Read full topic

@halflive9 wrote:

Good luck. Delta isn’t a really good base like hyperion but well it has something. As i always worked with delta before i think you should get these things done and do a lot more to turn into a good server. If you need any help just drop me a message.

@im0wnag3 wrote:

Well, i like the cammy pvp source, but there are lots of combat glitches, so here is my progress from fixing them.

Note: im using a different client then the cammy pvp one

To-Do-List: (Not done)

-fix prayer - 0%
-Barrows minigame - 0%
-Quests? - 0%
-less drop rates - 0%
-Fix gameframe - 0%
-Player clipping - 0%

-Delete commands - 0%
-Fighter torso + defenders from cyclops - 0%

-Fix mage timers - 35%

Pictures:

More coming soon…

-Deleted chaotic

-Fixed player was able to hit from far with melee (melee was like range) - fixed completly
-Fixed same ip trading + trading and dropping on new accounts (Only killing same ip to go)
